Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory88.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'By the time Pfaff had finished his business with the Fishing Guild and selected a carving knife in the market, it was already noon.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'Hurry, and pack up shop. Business is over today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Knife Seller', 3: 'The hell! I just sold me first shivvy!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Port Manager', 3: '"They" are coming. Go home where it\'s safe.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Pfaff realizes that the bionic tide is coming today.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'Where is the tide coming from?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'Huh? Like always, from the surrounding forest... Same deal this time...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Quickly paying the knife seller, Pfaff turns and hurries into the forest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Knife Seller', 3: 'Oi, gramps! Your change!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'Rosetta! Are you here?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pfaff shoves open the small door to the cabin. There are no signs of invasion by the tide, but Rosetta is nowhere to be found.'}
{3: 'Pfaff has previously ordered Rosetta to leave a note whenever she would leave home.'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "If only I hadn't gone out at this time... Rosetta... Where in God's name are you?", 4: '1'}
{3: "His intuition tells him that Rosetta's disappearance must be related to the bionic tide."}
{3: "And as if confirming Pfaff's thoughts, the characteristic roars of the bionics resound from outside the door."}
{2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'GAAWR...!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: 'Pfaff rushes out the door with an alacrity that betrays his old age. He begins firing his shotgun at the bionics.'}
{3: 'The pellets punch a massive cavity in the chest of a bionic, and it collapses onto the snow.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The tide, however, is more than just a singular bionic. More begin to surround Pfaff.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'A short whistle travels through the air, and over a dozen spears plummet from the sky, impaling the bionics that surrounded Pfaff.'}
{3: 'Crisp clip-clops of hooves approach. A centaur-shaped Construct leaps over the bushes and stands beside Pfaff.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Temia', 3: 'My name is Temia, a member of the Forest Guard. Are you injured, sir?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing this strange Construct introduce herself as a Forest Guard, Pfaff furrows his brows and shifts, quietly avoiding eye contact.'}
{3: "Taking Pfaff's silence for shock, Temia strides over to comfort him. Before reaching Pfaff, however, a bionic—not completely destroyed—suddenly hurls itself at her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'ROAAR—arghhh!!!', 4: '1'}
{3: "A blast from Pfaff's shotgun punches a hole straight through the bionic's chest. Smoke dissipates from the barrel."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "If you don't destroy their power connectors, they might get back up again. ", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Several other Forest Guard members arrive, reporting to Temia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forest Guard', 3: 'Captain! We found some fresh tracks leading to the foot of the mountain. Looks like they belong to a girl.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Temia', 3: 'To the mountains where the kids in town snuck off to...? But why?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guard', 3: "There are quite a few bionic footprints nearby. I'm worried that...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hearing the Forest Guard, Pfaff immediately slings his shotgun around his shoulder and hastily proceeds toward the mountain.'}
{2: 'Forest Guard', 3: 'Hey, where are you going?! Hey!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Temia', 3: 'Forest Guards, stay on guard and follow the hunter. Move out!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory54.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Rosetta cautiously hides behind a fallen tree and sniffed the air.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Vital fluid... They're still moving up the mountain!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I should've warned the girls not to go into the forest when I saw them off in the distance!", 4: '1'}
{3: "But she couldn't break the promise she made to her grandfather to not speak or meet with outsiders.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But now there are only two choices: charge ahead of the bionics to find the girls, or...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta firmly grips her trusty spear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Or destroy all of the bionics!', 4: '1'}
